name: part_006
file: tmp_【#ときのそら５周年記念】想いをこめて届ける3D配信！ [TjGC7Jzc5ns]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora continues her solo performance on stage.
MC section where Sora talks about the upbeat songs she just performed and announces the upcoming guest segment.
Transition screen showing the 5th Anniversary logo while Sora changes outfits.
Group performance of 'Shiny Smily Story' with guests.

subtitles.original: ...に時間をね
subtitles.english: ...to time.

subtitles.original: あの日があるから今がある
subtitles.english: Because of that day, I am here today.

subtitles.original: ついてきて！
subtitles.english: Come with me!

subtitles.original: Okay!
subtitles.english: Okay!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 大好きだよ！
subtitles.english: I love you all!

subtitles.original: Okay!
subtitles.english: Okay!

subtitles.original: ときに愛をよこせ　君の空を
subtitles.english: Sometimes give me your love, your sky.

subtitles.original: ずっと愛を紡ぐ　ずっと空を
subtitles.english: I'll keep spinning love, across the sky.

subtitles.original: ときに愛をよこせ　君の空を
subtitles.english: Sometimes give me your love, your sky.

subtitles.original: 空がたもつまた Let's go!
subtitles.english: The sky remains, so let's go!

subtitles.original: Ah ah ah- Ah ah ah-
subtitles.english: Ah ah ah- Ah ah ah-

subtitles.original: Wow wow wow- Wow wow wow-
subtitles.english: Wow wow wow- Wow wow wow-

subtitles.original: Let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、空ソングの『ケ・セラ・ソナタ』と
subtitles.english: Yes! So, that was the Sora-song 'Que Sera Sonata' and

subtitles.original: えー、新録曲『そらのとき』でした！どうだった？
subtitles.english: uh, the newly recorded song 'Sora no Toki'! How was it?

subtitles.original: ときに愛をちょうだい！はい！
subtitles.english: Give me love sometimes! Yes!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、いやー、楽しかったかな、みんな！
subtitles.english: Yes! So, was it fun, everyone?!

subtitles.original: 今回はね、上がる曲をいっぱい歌いたいなと思って
subtitles.english: This time, I wanted to sing a lot of upbeat songs.

subtitles.original: 今、ちょっと喋りながら若干後悔をしている自分がいる...
subtitles.english: Right now, as I'm talking, a part of me is slightly regretting it...

subtitles.original: すごい息が切れてるなーと思っているね。
subtitles.english: I'm thinking, 'Wow, I'm really out of breath.'

subtitles.original: ねー。でもみんなが楽しそうで、すごく嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Right? But you all look so happy, and that makes me so glad!

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: Hooray!

subtitles.original: みんなみんな、ぜひぜひいっぱい聴いて楽しんでね！
subtitles.english: Everyone, please listen to it a lot and enjoy!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: はい、というわけで、この後はなんと
subtitles.english: Alright, and up next...

subtitles.original: ゲストパートだよ！
subtitles.english: ...is the guest part!

subtitles.original: 私もお着替えしてこなくちゃ！
subtitles.english: I have to go change too!

subtitles.original: 同じ未来　指先で描きたい　あの夢手にしたい
subtitles.english: The same future, I want to draw it with my fingertips, I want to grasp that dream.

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った心で
subtitles.english: With our own different hearts,

subtitles.original: 走れもっと！
subtitles.english: Run even more!

subtitles.original: Shiny Smily Story 2022 ver.
subtitles.english: Shiny Smily Story 2022 ver.

subtitles.original: どこを見ても真っ暗な場所に　芽生えていた
subtitles.english: In a place where it was pitch black no matter where you looked, it had sprouted.

subtitles.original: こんな小さな希望に　瞳奪われた
subtitles.english: By such a small hope, my eyes were captivated.

subtitles.original: 不安で揺れる心を　うまくチューニングして
subtitles.english: Tuning my heart that trembles with anxiety well,

subtitles.original: こんな小さな勇気も　振り絞って行こう
subtitles.english: let's squeeze out even this tiny bit of courage and go.

subtitles.original: あきらめの文字　デリートして進む
subtitles.english: Deleting the word 'giving up' as I move forward.

subtitles.original: 苦しい時も　もう私は一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: Even in painful times, I'm not alone anymore.

subtitles.original: だからもっと夢追いかけたい　ワクワク止まらない
subtitles.english: So I want to chase my dreams even more, the excitement won't stop.

subtitles.original: 想像を超えてく世界　見せてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll show you a world that exceeds your imagination.

subtitles.original: アクセスしてみたい　後悔なんてさせない
subtitles.english: I want to try accessing it, I won't let you regret it.

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った心で
subtitles.english: With our own different hearts,

subtitles.original: 走れもっと！
subtitles.english: Run even more!

subtitles.original: 理想の空に輝く　眩しい想いは
subtitles.english: The dazzling thoughts shining in the ideal sky,

subtitles.original: 見たこともない光を　リアルに届けるよ
subtitles.english: will deliver a light you've never seen before, for real.

subtitles.original: いつも聴こえるエールは　ここにキャプチャして
subtitles.english: The cheers I always hear, I'll capture them here,

subtitles.original: また新しい光を　探したくなるよ
subtitles.english: and I'll want to search for new light again.

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔は　保存して進む
subtitles.english: Saving your smile as I move forward.

subtitles.original: 悲しい時に見返すよ　力が湧くから
subtitles.english: I'll look back at it when I'm sad, because it gives me strength.

subtitles.original: 胸を張って夢追いかけたい　奇跡はストーリー
subtitles.english: I want to chase my dreams with pride, miracles are a story.

subtitles.original: 一緒に作ろう　終わらない夢
subtitles.english: Let's create it together, an unending dream.

subtitles.original: 誰一人欠かせない　愛が待ったこの世界
subtitles.english: No one is replaceable in this world where love waited.

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った心で
subtitles.english: Color it with your own different hearts!

subtitles.original: 彩って！
subtitles.english: Color it!
